original: intros T U f D Hfilter Hclosed. unfold closed. intros. intro Hcontra. apply Hclosed. intros. intro HD. apply Hcontra. exists x0. intros eps Heps. specialize (Hfilter x0). destruct Hfilter as [delta Hdelta]. specialize (Hdelta eps). assert (Hcomp: exists delta', (forall y, ball x0 delta' y -> ball x0 delta y) /\ forall y, ball (f x0) eps (f y) -> fun x0 : T => ~ D (f x0) x0 = True). { exists delta. split. intros y Hy. apply Hy. intros y Hy. apply Hy. } destruct Hcomp as [delta' [Hball HDcontr]]. apply Hball. apply Heps.
